common: // Helper struct and drop function for testing
// This can be an empty drop implementation for testing

prefix: let data = AtomicPtr::new(Box::into_raw(Box::new(OwnedLifetime { ref_cnt: AtomicUsize::new(2), drop: drop_function })));

let len = 1; // valid length
owned_drop(&mut data, ptr, len);
